properties.title: Domhütte SAC
properties.abstract: Abri de secours (de mi-septembre à fin juin environ), pouvant accueillir 9 personnes est accessible. Prévoir le matériel de bivouac (réchaud, vaisselle, sac de couchage)
properties.description: A cabin full of character for mountaineers and alpine hikers, located in a high mountain landscape above Randa and surrounded by magnificent summits. The view extends from Breithorn over Matterhorn, Zinalrothorn and Weisshorn to, believe it or not, Balmhorn in the far away Bernese Oberland. The stone building erected in 1957 was the first of its kind by the architect Jakob Eschenmoser. The newly built annex complies with today’s comfort standards. The cabin makes possible summer ascents to seven four-thousanders of the Mischabel range.
